poem:
### A Call in the Darkness

In silence, the night cracks open,  
a sky seeded with drones,  
whispers in static breath.  
Powerful voices murmur across  
continents, the unseen  
echoing in metallic birds,  
while the world sleeps,  
cradled by shadows,  
and the earth quakes  
under an unspeaking moon.
